c74object.name: mlmat.split
c74object.digest: Splits data into testing and training
c74object.description: Splits data into testing and training.

attribute.name: seed
attribute.digest: Random seed if random basis being used
attribute.description: Random seed if random basis being used. 0 indicates no seed. (default = 0)

attribute.name: shuffle
attribute.digest: If true, the sample order is shuffled; otherwise, each sample is visited in linear order
attribute.description: If true, the sample order is shuffled; otherwise, each sample is visited in linear order. (default = 1)

attribute.name: ratio
attribute.digest: Percentage of dataset to use for test set (between 0 and 1)
attribute.description: Percentage of dataset to use for test set (between 0 and 1). (default = 0.2)
